metadata.description: If you can dream it, you can do it. That's Tom's motto, sometimes, when he's not being lazy that is. Tom Corbett is a real space cadet, out to lunch and completely unswayed by the needs of his crew. Well, it's not really his crew, but he'll do whatever it takes to change that.
metadata.name: Tom Corbett: Space Cadet: Danger in Deep Space
